title: Bug 47910: ajc outjar jarfile does not contain MANIFEST.MF
description: The ajc command with the outjar parameter is not creating a valid jar file when a METAINF/MANIFEST.MF file is present.
OB: When I execute the command 'ajc sourceroots <mydir> outjar <my.jar>', it creates an output file with a .jar extension. However, this file is not a valid jar file because it does not contain a MANIFEST.MF file.
EB: When the outjar parameter is used, the resulting file should be a valid jar file that contains a MANIFEST.MF file.
SR: To reproduce the issue, execute the command 'ajc sourceroots <mydir> outjar <my.jar>'. Verify that the resulting <my.jar> file does not contain a MANIFEST.MF file.
